oa:messageCheckBox.text: Save credit card for later use
oa:messageCheckBox.prompt: Save credit card for later use
oa:messageCheckBox.shortDesc: Save credit card for later use

oa:rawText.text: Attention - Please follow these steps to complete payment

1) Enter Card Holder Name as it appears on your credit card.

2) Enter Card Number (no dashes or spaces).

3) Enter Card Expiration Date.

4) Click Validate Card button; you should receive a message that says Card Validated successfully.

5) Verify the Payment Amount.

   a) Enter appropriate Payment Amount, if different than amount displayed, and press Recalculate button.

6) Click on the Apply button to complete the transaction.

oa:table.comment: This table displays a list of saved credit cards.
oa:table.shortDesc: This table displays a list of saved credit cards.

oa:advancedTable.comment: This table displays a list of saved bank accounts.
oa:advancedTable.shortDesc: This table displays a list of saved bank accounts.
